RelatedSentence: As Boko Haram 's attacks on Borno and Yobe  communities become fiercer , with more   than 15 , 700 persons displaced from their original homes , the National Emergency Management Agency ( NEMA ) at the weekend ,   provided relief materials to Chibok community , where over 200 schoolgirls were abducted .
Other  communities that benefited from the relief materials include , Gamboru that was raided by the insurgents , resulting in the loss of lives and destruction of many homes .
Other  communities that benefited from the relief materials include , Gamboru that was raided by the insurgents , resulting in the loss of lives and destruction of many homes .
NEMA  also distributed relief items to about 6 , 000 persons displaced by the insurgency in Goniri community and its environs in Gujba Local Government Area of Yobe State .
NEMA  also distributed relief items to about 6 , 000 persons displaced by the insurgency in Goniri community and its environs in Gujba Local Government Area of Yobe State .

Director General of the agency , Alhaji Muhammad Sani Sidi , who was represented by the North East Zonal Co-ordinator ,   Alhaji Mohammed Kanar ,   said the reliefs distribution was approved for the affected communities to provide them with succour while the government tackles the security challenges in the areas .

RelatedSentence: He pledged the continued support of the Federal Government towards the rehabilitation of the displaced persons after the return of peace in their communities and urged them to remain law - abiding .

RelatedSentence: On the reliefs delivery to Chibok , where about 5 , 300 benefited ,   he said it was normal to provide succour to the traumatized community , while the government strives to ensure the safe return of their abducted daughters .
